markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Catching](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2299)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 144 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 425 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** applied to shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

_Nethys Note: This rune was not reprinted in the remastered Treasure Vault book. _

A _catching_ rune creates a small, magical vacuum that attempts to pull weapons away from opponents. If you can attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) as part of a [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839), such as with the [Disarming Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=1896) feat or this rune's activated ability, a catching shield grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to such Disarm attempts.

**Activate** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You Shield Block a melee Strike made with a held weapon;  **Effect** You attempt to Disarm the creature whose attack you blocked of the weapon they attacked you with. You can do so even if you don't have a hand free.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Catching

You can do so even if you don't have a hand free.
